summary: A troubled teenager's mother tries everything she can think of to control her bad behavior, even if it means sending her away to a hokey but strict nature camp.
cast: Sharon Lawrence|Mika Boorem|Tamara Hope|Currie Graham|Katie Stuart|Andrea Whitburn|Gabrielle Rose|Tim Matheson|Sage Testini|Patricia Dahlquist|Rachel Hayward|Aaron Pearl|Giacomo Baessato|Jaren Brandt Bartlett|Aaron Isaacs|Joanne Wilson|Lucas McCann|Althea McAdam|Chilton Crane|Marie Stillin|Lorena Gale|Colin Lawrence|Julie Johnson|Peter Benson|John Tench|Dana McLoughlin|Silvana Kane|Kevin McNulty|Steven Man|Karen Brelsford|Jordan Henderson|Robert Saunders|Martha Tod Dudman|Georgia Howland|Denis Corbett|Yolanda Corbett|Dan McPeake|Robert Obara|Christian J. Stewart
title: No quiero perder a mi hija
